website_summaries.verdict: With many grown-up features, the Diamondback Cobra helps bridge the gap between children's and adult bikes.
pros: Shimano Tourney 3  with 7-speed drivetrain has 21 total speeds
Linear pull brakes with adjustable-reach levers
Fits riders 53 to 62 inches tall or 8 to 12 years old
cons: No kickstand or water bottle holder

customer_reviews.title: Happy boy on a great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Great quality. We bought this as a reward for our son doing good in homeschooling, and he loves it. No kick stand, which isnt a bad thing, one can easily be installed. It takes a mid-mounted kick stand if you prefer one. It even comes with tools to assemble the bike, which took 15 mins. Front wheel, seat/saddle, handle bars are simple to put on.
customer_reviews.author: CWY

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This bike was very difficult to put together. The video that is 20 minutes long said it took 4 minutes to put together. It took a retired Judge(who has put bikes together) and a college student 2 1/2 hours. The kickstand which was recommended didn’t come with correct bolts either. Parts were missing and we had to use bolts and tools we had to put it together! Hope bike is durable!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hale

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with punctured tires
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike, looks good but one of the tubes has a hole in it. Minor deal and easy to BUY a new tube, but I shouldn't have to. Also, Manufacturer tightened wheel nuts far beyond what they should be. I'm assuming it was done on an assembly line in China.... but so tight that the nuts deformed when using appropriately sized bike specific wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: kdmmcc

customer_reviews.title: Good bike but just a little bit too small for my son
customer_reviews.text: Good bike, however it turns out to be a bit small for my son who is 4ft 9inches tall. I bought this based on a size/height guide. I wonder can bigger tires be fitted onto this as it would certainly be easier for my son. He now prefers to use my wife's bike rather than his own as it is just that bit bigger with the frame just a bit bigger and larger wheels. The only reason this didnt get 5 out of 5 was for the sizing reason as its a very good bike and was easy enough to put together out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: Trigger shifters
customer_reviews.text: Product came with twist shifters. The main reason I bought it is because it was said to have trigger shifters
customer_reviews.author: Henry Njenga Njuguna

customer_reviews.title: Solid kids bike for 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike. I’ve noticed the same thing as another reviewer which is the tire is close to the peddles when turning. This may not be a problem for all but seems like a design issue. Twist grip shifting also, which was not pictured but expected from other reviewers. Easy to install a kick stand, but was not included. Solid bike under 200.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly might have been confusing without reading other reviews, but this is otherwise a great buy! I was hesitant to buy because of the “wheel hitting foot” issue in some reviews, but if assembled correctly, this isn’t a problem. My 5’0” 11-year-old ride this bicycle daily, and there’s plenty of room for adjusting as he grows. The seat isn’t comfortable, but that’s easy to replace, as we did. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! Quality is way better than the junk you get from the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Kallevig

customer_reviews.title: Now he can easily keep up on family rides
customer_reviews.text: Very well built! My 10 yr old son got it for his birthday and loves it. Now he can easily keep up on family rides.
customer_reviews.author: Jimstrong89

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and value for a 10-year-old boy
customer_reviews.text: 10-year-old boy loves it. Now he can keep up with this older brother's mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The bike in the picture shows thumb shifters. Some of the answers to the questions say the same. They’re not. I’d like some sent.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good bike. Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 2 stairs because 1. There was no assembly instructions 2. After assembly, and 10 mins of driving the pedal broke.
customer_reviews.author: VijayMdu

customer_reviews.title: Bike was delivered with broken rear derailleur.
customer_reviews.text: Rear Derailleur was broken during shipping. Had to buy a new one and pay for it to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike - the third one I have purchased for grandchildren. Easy assembly - only took 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: dentistattorney

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this! It was easy to put together, I’m hoping it is as tough as he is. He told me yesterday that he has no dressier to be stuck inside playing video games when he has such a great bike to ride. If you knew my son, you’d know how big of a statement that is!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Martinazzi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Can’t pedal and turn at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: The frame of the bike isn’t long enough. My son can’t pedal and turn at the same time the front wheel hits the pedal when he turns. The bike is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike should be taken off the market, complete safety hazard. Whom ever designed this needs some more training, the pedals hit the front tire whenever you turn the handle bars. I'm 59yrs old and it knocked me off the bike into the street.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son he is 5ft tall and is 10 loves his bike and is always biking with friends
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Aleman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: needs multiple fixes and will not shift up on the left side after a period of time
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Foley

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles Cobra Youth Mountain Bike
feature_bullets: Shimano Tourney 3x7 speed drivetrain has 21 speeds, allowing small riders to conquer dirt trails
Hl Zoom 40mm travel fork soaks up rocks and roots just like on a bike for Big kids
Linear pull brakes have adjustable-reach levers to keep them safe and in control

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
